verbs.description: [V: Speaking] [ARG2: to Fox News ' Maria Bartiromo] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday morning] , [ARG0: Senator Lindsey Graham] joked that there would be mass liberal casualties if President Donald Trump actually won a Nobel Peace Prize .
